trans-unit.source: Remove high DPI settings from {0} and configure via Application.SetHighDpiMode API or '{1}' project property
trans-unit.target: Удалить параметры высокого DPI из "{0}" и настроить через API приложения Application.SetHighDpiMode или свойство проекта "{1}"

trans-unit.source: Remove high DPI settings from {0} and configure via '{1}' property in Application Framework
trans-unit.target: Удалить параметры высокого DPI из {0} и настроить через свойство "{1}" в исполняющей среде

trans-unit.source: Avoid passing a 'Func<T>' to 'InvokeAsync' where 'T' is a 'Task' or 'ValueTask', unless your intention is for the delegate to simply be kicked off as an unsupervised task. Instead, use 'Func<CancellationToken, ValueTask>' or 'Func<CancellationToken, ValueTask<T>>', so that the delegate passed to 'InvokeAsync' can be awaited, allowing exceptions to be properly handled.
trans-unit.target: Avoid passing a 'Func<T>' to 'InvokeAsync' where 'T' is a 'Task' or 'ValueTask', unless your intention is for the delegate to simply be kicked off as an unsupervised task. Instead, use 'Func<CancellationToken, ValueTask>' or 'Func<CancellationToken, ValueTask<T>>', so that the delegate passed to 'InvokeAsync' can be awaited, allowing exceptions to be properly handled.

trans-unit.source: Task is being passed to 'InvokeAsync' without a cancellation token
trans-unit.target: Task is being passed to 'InvokeAsync' without a cancellation token

trans-unit.source: Task is being passed to 'InvokeAsync' without a cancellation token
trans-unit.target: Task is being passed to 'InvokeAsync' without a cancellation token
